title: WSB's Weekend Bite Week Ending April 22: Investing In Earth Through REITs + Solar Energy
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: Happy Earth Day! This week's episode centers on sustainability and ESG investing. We are joined by Alex Snyder, Portfolio Manager at Centersquare Capital Management, and Jonas Wallmander, CEO of Azelio.
